summary: Wellness app (SHAMMAH) enhancements across health tracking, dashboard, finance, social/personal growth tools; landing page header branding change to Butterfly Wellness wordmark is being reverted because the new image is not displaying.
architectural_notes: External self-awareness tools should open via external links but provide an easy way for the user to return back to the app.
Header logo/text located in frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx and should be replaced with Butterfly Wellness wordmark image only (remove SHAMMAH text).
known_issues: Build system sometimes fails with 'AI couldn't implement that request' and may require breaking changes into smaller chunks.
Butterfly Wellness wordmark header image is not displaying after deployment; user requested reverting to previous header image.

existing_features.title:
Update the Landing page header to fully replace the SHAMMAH branding with the Butterfly Wellness main wordmark image only: (1) replace the existing header (XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[1]/img[1]) to use the uploaded Butterfly Wellness wordmark image, and (2) remove the SHAMMAH

element entirely (XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[1]/h1[1]).

Add the uploaded Butterfly Wellness wordmark image to the frontend as a static public asset and reference it from the Landing page header src. Use a filename and path that avoids spaces/special characters.

Revert the landing page header branding in `frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx` to what it was before the Butterfly Wellness wordmark change, since the header image is not displaying. Specifically, remove the header `` that references `/assets/branding/butterfly-wellness-wordmark.png` and restore the previous SHAMMAH header branding (text-based, not dependent on the missing image), while keeping the existing header layout (left branding, right Sign In button).

new_feature_requests.summary: Baseline symptom entry via body map, with ability to upload photos from gallery afterward
Personalize dashboard based on quiz outcome acknowledgement
Daily trackers should log adherence for meals (breakfast/lunch/dinner), exercise, sleep, and skincare routine
Make +Add Goal interactive to allow goal entry
Health monitoring view should use Monday–Sunday week format
Spiritual exercise button should open links when clicked
Mood journal entries should award 1 point when selected/confirmed
Allow users to add personal social media profiles/links in Social Connection pillars including WhatsApp
Financial health: change currency to £ and make Budget Tracker +Add Expense interactive like +Add Debt
Finance dashboard: selectable list of UK banks (include digital banks Monzo, Revolut, Starling) and/or Open Banking API sync option
Add period tracker (Flo-like) in Physical Health with symptom logging (cramps, mood, flow, etc.)
Social Connection: add entry button for special dates (birthdays, anniversaries, weddings, parties, holidays, etc.)
Personal Growth: add self-awareness tools section with explanations + external links (MBTI, Enneagram, Big Five, StrengthsFinder, Wheel of Life, Horoscope, Numerology) and easy return back to app

projectName: Replace landing page header branding with Butterfly Wellness wordmark
